languages.text: "Безусловно, Ваша Светлость, у меня есть доказательства. Расследование показало, что члены семейства Версериан, ответственного за флотилию, а также логистику Даргонуса, используя свои связи и влияние, подделали ряд документов, чтобы подорвать логистические маршруты и нарушить экономику планеты, тем самым вызвав смуту".

traits.locale_text: "Безусловно, Ваша Светлость, у меня есть доказательства. Расследование показало, что члены семейства Версериан, ответственного за флотилию, а также логистику Даргонуса, используя свои связи и влияние, подделали ряд документов в Адептус Администратум, чтобы подорвать логистические маршруты и нарушить экономику планеты, тем самым вызвав волну некотролируемых бунтов". {n}В толпе знати проносится вихрь наигранных и неискренних возмущений.{/n}
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."
languages.original_text: "Безусловно, Ваша Светлость, у меня есть доказательства. Расследование показало, что члены семейства Версериан, ответственного за флотилию, а также логистику Даргонуса, используя свои связи и влияние, подделали ряд документов, чтобы подорвать логистические маршруты и нарушить экономику планеты, тем самым вызвав смуту".

traits.locale_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your mf|Lordship Ladyship}. The investigation has uncovered that the members of the Werserian family, who are responsible for both the fleet and the logistics of Dargonus, have had forged several documents, using their connections and influence, to undermine the logistic routes and the planet's economy, and thus causing the riots among the inhabitants."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your mf|Lordship Ladyship}. The investigation has uncovered that the members of the Werserian family, who are responsible for both the fleet and the logistics of Dargonus, have had forged several documents, using their connections and influence, to undermine the logistic routes and the planet's economy, and thus causing the riots among the inhabitants."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your mf|Lordship Ladyship}. The investigation has established that the members of the Werserian family, who are responsible for both the fleet and the logistics of Dargonus, forged several documents, pulling their strings and using their influence, to undermine the logistic routes and the planet's economy, and thus causing the riots among the inhabitants."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your mf|Lordship Ladyship}. The investigation has established that the members of the Werserian family, who are responsible for both the fleet and the logistics of Dargonus, forged several documents, pulling their strings and using their influence, to undermine the logistic routes and the planet's economy, and thus causing the riots among the inhabitants."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

traits.locale_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: 「もちろん、証拠があります、陛下。調査の結果、ダルゴナスの艦隊とその兵站を担うウェルザリアン家のメンバーが、その人脈と影響力を利用して、この惑星の補給路と経済を弱体化させるために多くの文書を偽造し、住民の不安を煽ったことが判明したのです」
languages.original_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろん、証拠があります、陛下。調査の結果、ダルゴナスの艦隊とその兵站を担うウェルザリアン家のメンバーが、その人脈と影響力を利用して、この惑星の補給路と経済を弱体化させるために多くの文書を偽造し、住民の不安を煽ったことが判明したのです」
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: “我当然有证据，大人。调查结果表明，韦尔森家族的成员，也就是那些负责管理达戈努斯舰队与物流系统的人，他们利用自身的关系与影响力伪造了大量文件，破坏物流路线与行星经济，从而引发了多地居民的暴动。”
languages.original_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: “我当然有证据，大人。调查结果表明，韦尔森家族的成员，也就是那些负责管理达戈努斯舰队与物流系统的人，他们利用自身的关系与影响力伪造了大量文件，破坏物流路线与行星经济，从而引发了多地居民的暴动。”
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Notre enquête a établi que les membres de la famille Werserian, responsable de la flotte et de la logistique sur Dargonus, ont usé de leur réseau et de leur influence pour falsifier des documents et saper les voies de ravitaillement et l'économie de la planète, ce qui a poussé les habitants à la révolte. »
languages.original_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. Notre enquête a établi que les membres de la famille Werserian, responsable de la flotte et de la logistique sur Dargonus, ont usé de leur réseau et de leur influence pour falsifier des documents et saper les voies de ravitaillement et l'économie de la planète, ce qui a poussé les habitants à la révolte. »
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: «Por supuesto que tengo pruebas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La investigación ha establecido que los miembros de la familia Werserian, responsable tanto de la flota de Dargonus como de su logística, usaron sus contactos e influencia para falsificar una serie de documentos con los que socavar las rutas de abastecimiento y la economía del planeta, fomentando la rebeldía entre los habitantes».
languages.original_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto que tengo pruebas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La investigación ha establecido que los miembros de la familia Werserian, responsable tanto de la flota de Dargonus como de su logística, usaron sus contactos e influencia para falsificar una serie de documentos con los que socavar las rutas de abastecimiento y la economía del planeta, fomentando la rebeldía entre los habitantes».
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "Natürlich habe ich Beweise, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Untersuchung hat ergeben, dass Mitglieder der Familie Werserian, die für die Flotte von Dargonus und deren Logistik verantwortlich ist, ihre Kontakte und ihren Einfluss geltend gemacht haben, um eine Reihe von Dokumenten zu fälschen, um die Versorgungswege und die Wirtschaft des Planeten zu unterminieren, was wiederum zu Unruhen unter den Bewohnern geführt hat."
languages.original_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: "Selbstverständlich habe ich Beweise, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Die Ermittlungen haben ergeben, dass die Mitglieder der Familie Werserian, die sowohl für die Flotte als auch für die Logistik auf Dargonus verantwortlich ist, verschiedene Dokumente gefälscht hat. Sie haben ihre Kontakte und ihren Einfluss genutzt, um die logistischen Routen und die Wirtschaft des Planeten zu untergraben und so den Aufstand der Bewohner zu provozieren."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, pek tabii delilim var. Soruşturma vesilesiyle, Dargonus'un filo ve lojistik işlerine bakan Werserian ailesi mensuplarının temaslarını ve nüfuzlarını kullanarak gezegenin ikmal hatlarını ve ekonomisini baltaladığını, bu sayede de halkı galeyana getirdiğini öğrenmiş bulunuyoruz."
languages.original_text: "Of course I have evidence, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. The investigation has established that members of the Werserian family, which is responsible for both Dargonus's fleet and its logistics, used their contacts and influence to forge a host of documents in order to undermine the planet's supply routes and economy, thus fomenting unrest among the inhabitants."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, pek tabii delilim var. Soruşturma vesilesiyle öğrendik ki Dargonus'un filo ve lojistik işlerine bakan Werserian hanesi mensupları, temaslarını ve nüfuzlarını kullanarak gezegenin ikmal hatlarını ve ekonomisini baltalamış; böylece halkı galeyana getirmiştir."
traits.speaker: Gouvernor
